% -*-latex-*-
\begin{figure}
\begin{center}
\mbox{\beginpicture
\setcoordinatesystem units <3in, 0.0003in> point at 0 0
\setplotarea x from 0 to 1, y from 0 to 10000
\axis left  /
\axis top  /
\axis right  /
\axis bottom 
  label {$\hat p$}
  ticks withvalues 0 {$p$} / at 0 0.8 1 / /
%n=1; 1000 observations
\put {$n=1$} [bl] <1ex,1ex> at 0 207
\plot 0 207 1 793 /
\multiput {$\bullet$} at 0 207 1 793 /
%n=10; 10000 observations
\put  {$n=10$} [br] <-0.5ex,0.5ex> at 0.6 888
\plot
0.20000000 0 0.30000000 6 0.40000000 58
0.50000000 251 0.60000000 888 0.70000000 2121 0.80000000 2982
0.90000000 2564 1.00000000 1130
/

0.20000000 0 0.30000000 6 0.40000000 58
0.50000000 251 0.60000000 888 0.70000000 2121 0.80000000 2982
0.90000000 2564 1.00000000 1130
/
